title: Harold
content:
1 380

1d10 +1 Piercing

Haroldish Doom: When you deal damage to a target with a ranged weapon, it must succeed a Charisma Saving Throw or be Baned for 2 turns.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

Named after Harold Butterbisk, who owned the Butterbisk Inn in Waterdeep before it was renamed by new owners. The stock of the crossbow reads: Quaffing is a shootable offence.

Heavy Crossbow 18m Two-Handed

Harold is one of the Heavy Crossbow Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3.
